QuestData.Title: Adversarial Blood
QuestData.Description: The descendants held prisoner by the Skettis talonpriests are listed in this book: Gezzarak the Huntress, Karrog the crystal giant, the heretic known as Darkscreecher Akkarai and Vakkiz the Windrager. They will all need to be slain before Terokk returns to this world.$B$BYou will need the scrolls carried by the time-lost arakkoa to call them forth at the summoning circles in Skettis. These are powerful beings you will be facing; you would do well to bring friends.
QuestData.LogDescription: Find the Skull Piles in the middle of the summoning circles of Skettis. Summon and defeat each of the descendants by using 10 Time-Lost Scrolls at the Skull Pile. Return to Hazzik at Blackwind Landing.
QuestData.RewardText: Excellent! Take this. I've prepared this bundle with items symbolizing the foes you've defeated. They will allow you to summon Terokk.$b$bBeware, $n. He is the most powerful arakkoa to ever exist. Do not underestimate him!
